Tea, coconut, and rubber are considered as major crops in Sri Lanka. All the supervision & operational activities related to these crops are carried out by the Ministry of Plantation Industries. Several institutions have established for the betterment of the field of coconut cultivation. Among them, the Coconut Cultivation Board takes a prominent place. The key objective of the Coconut Cultivation Board is to uplift the production of coconut and productivity and to establish sustainable coconut cultivation by providing necessary input and financial facilities to coconut growers island-wide through an efficient extension & advisory service. Currently, it has spread over million acres of land island-wide, which means both as a domestic crop and as a commercial crop. Coconut Cultivation Board has a limited number of Coconut Development Officers to provide new technical information and services to coconut growers. This situation is the main issue encountered by the Board.
Launching a mobile application is another revolutionary step taken by the Coconut Cultivation Board to make efficiency in extension service by using modern technical methods. In modern society, mobile phones are strongly attached to the lifestyle of people. The majority of the countries in the world have used mobile phone communication technology to create an optimistic influence on social, economic and cultural aspects. Among a large number of mobile applications utilized in the present society, applications related to agriculture have taken much popularity.
Currently, there is no official mobile application in Sri Lanka to provide descriptive information on technical services related to coconut cultivation. To fill this void, the Coconut Cultivation Board created a new mobile application called “Coconut App”. Coconut growers can install this application free-of-charge. This application has divided technical information related to coconut cultivation into two layers; all the details are provided in a precise and simple manner that can be understood by ordinary people and the relevant documents can be downloaded for the benefit of any individual either for commercial purpose or academic purpose.
This mobile application provides information on various field activities related to coconut cultivation, various diseases and pest control methods, services provided by Coconut Cultivation Board and expenses about all the field activities related to coconut cultivation to coconut growers through several packages. In addition, the coconut grower can watch some short videos for further information on diseases and pests related to coconut cultivation.
This application also facilitates the grower to register and obtain services provided by the Coconut Cultivation Board, gather information about the places by which necessary inputs can be purchased and directions to those places. Coconut growers can submit the issues encountered at the field related to coconut cultivation in words, as a voice message, picture or videotape and obtain the assistance of relevant technical officers with immediate effect. If you want to improve your study and work efficiency, we recommend a super-concentration study timer that can record time! A dedicated timer for the Pomodoro Technique, which "easily keeps you focused", and a comfortable background music of natural sounds like the sound of waves that bring out "alpha waves" will lead you to a [super-concentrated state]!

This app is a free study timer app that allows you to practice the Pomodoro Technique, which has already changed the lives of millions of people internationally, with just one tap.

It is also ideal as a background music app for study and work, a time recording app, and a remaining days count app!


◆◇ What is the Pomodoro method (Pomodoro technique)?
A time management technique devised by Italian entrepreneur and author Francesco Cirillo in the 1980s.

It's very easy to do.

One set consists of 25 minutes of concentration and 5 minutes of rest, and you can repeat up to 4 sets. After that, take a slightly longer break of 20-45 minutes.

It's a very simple time management system, but it can greatly increase your productivity, help you focus and help you reach your goals.


◆◇ How to use the app
Decide on focus time, break time, number of sets,
Just start the timer!

* Since it is a repeat timer, no troublesome work is required!
* No need to press a button every time you take a break or refocus.
* If you start with the same menu every time, you can manage time with one tap!
* Notify the end of focus time and break time by alarm.


◆◇ Find a focus time that suits you!
A typical set is 25 minutes of focus and 5 minutes of break, with a maximum of 4 sets. However, if you feel that 25 minutes is too long for your focus time, try adjusting your focus time to 15 minutes and your break time to 3 minutes.

If you can't do 4 sets due to time constraints, you can change the number of sets. Please adjust according to your physical condition and time.


◆◇ Why does background music of natural sounds improve concentration?
First of all, alpha waves are one of the brain waves that often appear when the mind and body are in a state of relaxation or concentration.
One way to draw out alpha waves is to listen to music that contains a rhythm called "1/f fluctuation."
The rhythm of "1/f fluctuation" is included in natural sounds such as the sound of waves, the sound of rain, and the murmuring of a river, as well as music box sounds. And the rhythm can be expected to have effects such as healing and concentration improvement from comfort. 


◆◇ Change the background music according to your taste and mood!
Five kinds of comfortable background music are available. Choose according to your taste and mood, draw out alpha waves, and show your concentration.

1．WAVE [Wave sounds x Music Box]
